img_below_text:
Go back down the stairs to the body of water, and take the left out to the Rockrest Flat where you’ll find another Keeper’s Shrine. From the Keeper’s Shrine, go left and you’ll see the final Buddha Head. When you have all 6, chanting will begin letting you know you have everything you need.
Buddha’s Eyeball 6

img_summary: The image depicts a player character in a rocky, arid environment approaching a marked object, likely a Buddha Head, which is highlighted with a red dashed circle. This is part of a collectible quest in the game, where the player must locate and gather all six Buddha Heads. The setting and context suggest this is the location for Buddha’s Eyes 6, as referenced in the preceding and following text.
